name: MIDNIGHT OIL
description:
Created as part of the Coffee Jam.

Game built in 6 days for #COFFEEJAM.

I apologize for it being as rough around the edges as it is, but this is the first time in 2 years or so that I've touched Unity and Blender, so it took some getting back to.

Hope you guys have as much fun with this as I did trying to put it together!

(Hopefully soon I'll get a chance to add to this and make this prototype into the idea I imagined)
